text: In a medium-sized bowl, mix the flour, sugar, and hot chocolate mix together with a whisk and make a well in the center
label: step

text: Add the oil, eggs, and cream to the well and whisk though roughly until the whole mixture is homogenous
label: step

text: Pour the batter into an oiled baking pan and sprinkle the chocolate chips on top
label: step

text: Bake for about 20 minutes or until a toothpick comes out dry
label: step
